articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Machine Plant
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Machine Plant
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the machine plant managed by Ho Chol Yong.
					 Kim Jong Un instructed the officials and workers of the plant to produce new type modern huge machines and equipment during the 70-day campaign in the run-up to the Seventh Congress of the WPK, reposing deep trust in them.
					
					 He personally took a step to ensure the serial production of new type world-level modern machines and equipment developed for the first time in the country, frequently learned about the problems arising in doing so and personally settled them one by one.
					
					 The officials and workers of the plant successfully produced dozens of highly efficient modern Korean-style machines and equipment entirely by their own efforts and supplied them to various units of the national economy. 
					
					 Appreciating a lot of efforts made by them to carry out their huge production plan in a matter of 70 days, he highly praised the workers of the plant for presenting an excellent gift to the Seventh Congress of the WPK by fulfilling their pledge made to the WPK without fail.
					
					 All products under contract including the core parts used for manufacturing machines and equipment were made entirely by our own efforts and with indigenous technology and materials, he noted, adding that self-development serves as a rich source of working such a miracle and nothing is impossible when the self-development-first principle is given full play.
					
					 Recalling that the party has recently guided the work for updating many machine plants as required by the age of knowledge-based economy after making a decision to bring about a leap forward in the nation's machine-building industry, he said that this plant is now capable of successfully producing machines and equipment which it can boast to the world and proudly ranked itself among front-rankers of the Mallima movement.
					
					 He went round the construction site of modernizing the steel casting shop and the room for disseminating science and technology.
					
					 What is important for modernizing the steel casting shop is to maximize the proportion of local production at the manufacturing and technical processes, he said. Calling on the plant to modernize the steel casting shop till the founding anniversary of the WPK this year under the strong backing of the party, he took a measure for doing so.
					
					 He set forth the tasks to be fulfilled by the plant, underscoring the need to dynamically push ahead with the modernization of all production processes under a long-range plan while carrying out the project for updating the steel casting shop.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the officials and workers of the plant would perform miracles and feats in producing modern highly-efficient machines and equipment as intended by the party, always bearing in mind they have a very important duty to fulfill in the drive for achieving the prosperity of the country. He had a photo session with them.
					
					 He was accompanied by Ri Man Gon, vice-chairman of the WPK Central Committee, and Jo Yong Won, vice department director of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Protocol on DPRK-Russia Joint Commission on Cooperation in Field of Fishery Signed
articles.content:
Protocol on DPRK-Russia Joint Commission on Cooperation in Field of Fishery Signed
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- A protocol on the 29th meeting of the DPRK-Russia joint commission on cooperation in the field of fishery was signed here Thursday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were officials concerned including the Ministry of Fisheries and from the opposite side members of the delegation of the Federal Agency of Fisheries of Russia and a councilor of the Russian embassy here.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- Abraham Ramirez Lituma, director general and editor-in-chief of the Peruvian newspaper El Callao, and other foreign guests visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Thursday.
					 They laid bouquets before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Peruvian Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Peruvian Delegation
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the visiting delegation of the Peruvian General Federation of Workers.
					 Executive member of the federation Leopoldo Ortiz Centty, general secretary of the Port Trade Union, who is heading the delegation, handed the gift over to an official concerned on Thursday.

articles.title: Peruvian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Peruvian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Peruvian General Federation of Workers headed by executive member Leopoldo Ortiz Centty, general secretary of the Port Trade Union, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The guests laid a bouquet at the old home of Mangyongdae with great respect for the President.
					
					 They looked round historical relics, being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and patriotic lives of his family members.
					
					 They went round revolutionary relics on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 They also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, Sci-Tech Complex, etc.

articles.title: Delegation of Ministry of Land and Environment Protection Leaves for Kenya
articles.content:
Delegation of Ministry of Land and Environment Protection Leaves for Kenya
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection led by Minister Kim Kyong Jun left here Thursday to take part in the second meeting of the General Assembly of the United Nations Environment Programme to be held in Nairobi, Kenya.

articles.title: Friendship Meeting with Staff Members of Vietnamese Embassy Held
articles.content:
Friendship Meeting with Staff Members of Vietnamese Embassy Held
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- A friendship meeting with staff members of the Vietnamese embassy here took place at DPRK-Vietnam Friendship Kyongsang Kindergarten on Thursday on the occasion of the 126th birth anniversary of President Ho Chi Minh.
					 The participants laid bouquets before the painting depicting President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They paid tribute to a picture of President Kim Il Sung meeting Vietnamese President Ho Chi Minh at Ho Chi Minh class.
					
					 Being briefed on the fact that children are growing up healthy in the cradle of happiness, they looked round the physical exercise room and other places.
					
					 They enjoyed an art performance given by children and had a talk.
					
					 Present at the meeting on invitation were Vietnamese Ambassador to the DPRK Pham Viet Hung and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 It was attended by Vice-Chairman Jo Chol Ryong and members of the DPRK-Vietnam Friendship Association.

articles.title: Social Scientists Hold Symposium on Newly Excavated Metal Types
articles.content:
Social Scientists Hold Symposium on Newly Excavated Metal Types
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- A symposium of social scientists took place at the Sci-Tech Complex Thursday. It dealt with the metal types dating back to Koryo Dynasty that were excavated in Manwoltae, Kaesong and their significance in cultural history.
					 Attending it were officials, teachers, researchers, lecturers, journalists and editors in the fields of science, education, preservation of national heritages and media.
					
					 Speeches were made under the titles "On the excavation of metal types in Manwoltae, Kaesong", "On the period of casting metal types excavated in Manwoltae, Kaesong", "13th Century was a heyday in the use of metal types in Koryo" and "On significance in cultural history of Koryo metal types unearthed in Manwoltae, Kaesong ".
					
					 The speakers explained how four metal types were excavated in Manwoldae of Kaesong, site of the royal palace of Koryo Dynasty, in April and described their shape, size and quality. Recalling the fact that no other architecture had been built in Manwoltae for about 700 years, the speakers ascertained to the fact that the newly excavated metal types belong to Koryo Dynasty.
					
					 They said that given the clear origin of those metal types and characteristics of their style it is certain they were cast in the period from the first half of the 12th century to the first half of the 13th century and that the casting of metal types was pushed forward as a nationwide project in this period.
					
					 Many historical books eloquently prove that printing technology was very high in the period of Koryo and the use of metal types was at its height in our country in the 13th century, the speakers added.
					
					 They said that the newly excavated metal types are of great significance in cultural history.
					
					 They renewed their pledge to steadily intensify excavation of national heritages and scientific researches and make active contribution to further glorifying the time-honored history and brilliant culture of Korea.

articles.title: DPRK Sportspersons Resolved to Make Fresh Successes at Int'l Games
articles.content:
DPRK Sportspersons Resolved to Make Fresh Successes at Int'l Games
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- Sportspersons in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are resolved to register signal successes at international games and contribute to building a sporting powerhouse.
					 Kim Pyong Sik, vice-minister of Physical Culture and Sports, told KCNA:
					
					 In his historic report made at the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, supreme leader Kim Jong Un clearly indicated the way for turning the country into a sporting powerhouse.
					
					 We will devote all our wisdom and energies to raising the nation's sports techniques to the world level at an early date and stirring up the sports zeal throughout the country, true to his high intention.
					
					 Our efforts will be concentrated on the work to put all trainings on a scientific basis and perfect Korean-style playing tactics so as to clinch more gold medals at Olympiad and other international games.
					
					 Kim Thae Song, head of the Kigwancha Sports Team, said:
					
					 The athletes and coaches of our team are now hardening their will to exalt the dignity and honor of Juche Korea by bagging more gold medals.
					
					 We will fully display the ideological firmness, perseverance, speed and skills in all games and make preferential efforts to training talented athletes.
					
					 My team will take the lead in a drive for carrying into practice the WPK's plan on building a sports powerhouse.

articles.title: Production Goes up at Musan Mining Complex of DPRK
articles.content:
Production Goes up at Musan Mining Complex of DPRK
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- The Musan Mining Complex, a leading iron ore producer of the DPRK, is increasing production to implement the decision made at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 In recent five days, the complex turned out 2 000 more tons of iron ore as against the same period of last year, by raising the operation rate of mining, conveying and dressing equipment, including large cone crushers, 1.5 times,
					
					 The complex had already shown unprecedented production results to significantly greet the Seventh WPK Congress.

articles.title: State Invention Office Marks 70th Birthday
articles.content:
State Invention Office Marks 70th Birthday
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- The State Invention Office marked the 70th anniversary of its founding.
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the State Invention Office on May 20, Juche 35 (1946), clearly indicating the road for it to follow and laying a firm foundation for intensifying the work for inventions and technical findings through his energetic guidance.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il wisely led the office to make a positive contribution to the development of the nation's science and technology.
					
					 Over the past 70 years, the office has developed into a state invention administrative organ equipped with a doctoral institute training experts in intellectual property, a well-organized system for examining and recording inventions and patents and a huge database for domestic and foreign inventions and patents under the leadership and warm care of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu. As a result, it has creditably discharged its revolutionary mission for stepping up the building of a sci-tech power.
					
					 A meeting took place on Thursday.

articles.title: Great Programme for National Reunification Set forth by Kim Jong Un Supported by Officials of Chongryon
articles.content:
Great Programme for National Reunification Set forth by Kim Jong Un Supported by Officials of Chongryon
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- Leading officials of the organizations of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) issued statements on Tuesday reflecting their firm will to turn out in the struggle for implementing the great programme for national reunification set forth by supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Ri Thae Il, director of the Central Standing Management Board of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan, said that the fresh Juche-oriented line and policy for national reunification advanced by Kim Jong Un with his warm love for the country and nation are the most reasonable and independent line as they reflect the will and wishes of all Koreans and specific conditions of the country.
					
					 Ri Yong Su, chairman of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan, said that the line and policy for reunification set forth by Kim Jong Un are the immortal great programme for the country's independent reunification and building of a reunified thriving power and a patriotic banner encouraging all compatriots to come out in the sacred struggle for ushering in a fresh era of national prosperity.
					
					 Kim Jong Su, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Writers and Artistes in Japan, said that Kim Jong Un clarified the policy for national reunification, thus dynamically aroused the Korean nation to the struggle for accomplishing the historic cause of national reunification.
					
					 Ri Chong Gyong, director of the Standing Council of the Korean Sportsmen's Federation in Japan, said that all the officials of the federation and Korean sportspersons in Japan would more positively and widely conduct the work for national unity in line with the character of sports, firmly upholding the policy for national reunification advanced by Kim Jong Un, and thus make a tangible contribution to building a reunified power on the land of Korea.
					
					 Kim Hyon Il, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Students in Japan, said that the more he read the line and policy for national reunification set forth by Kim Jong Un, the more keenly he realized the wisdom and efforts the great leaders devoted to national reunification till the last moments of their lives and the stronger conviction he cherished in the rosy future of national reunification.

articles.title: Chairmen of Chongryon Headquarters Support Reunification Line and Policy Set Forth at Party Congress
articles.content:
Chairmen of Chongryon Headquarters Support Reunification Line and Policy Set Forth at Party Congress
Pyongyang, May 18 (KNS-KCNA) -- Chairmen of the headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) Wednesday issued statements supporting the line and policies for national reunification set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Among them were Hwang Myong, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters; Jong Song Han, chairman of the Hokkaido Prefectural Headquarters; Kim Sang Il, chairman of the Kyoto Prefectural Headquarters; Ri Yong Hun, chairman of the Kanagawa Prefectural Headquarters; and Kim Yu Won, chairman of the Ibaragi Prefectural Headquarters. 
					
					 They said in their statements that Kim Jong Un clarified the issue of national reunification as the most important and urgent task and indicated comprehensive ways of implementing it at the Party Congress.
					
					 They underlined the need to uphold the line and policies for national reunification advanced by the Marshal as the immortal great programme for pulling down the barrier of division and paving a wide avenue to reunification and the banner of national independence and great national unity for arousing all Koreans to the new nationwide struggle for reunification.
					
					 They praised the line and policies for national reunification as the comprehensive succession and development in depth of the idea and line for independent reunification put forward by the great leaders and a perfect great programme for national reunification as they clearly indicate the path of achieving the cause of national reunification.
					
					 They expressed their will to breathe with the people in the homeland and keep pace with them with the pride of being the members of the Korean nation and resolutely turn out in the sacred war for accomplishing the cause of national reunification according to the Juche-based line and policies for national reunification advanced by the Marshal.
					
					 They fully supported and approved the reunification policies for national independence, great national unity, ensuring of peace and realizing of federal formula indicated by the Marshal as the immortal great programme for comprehensively implementing the behests of the great leaders for national reunification.

articles.title: Preserving Peace on Korean Peninsula Is Urgent, Realistic Task: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Preserving Peace on Korean Peninsula Is Urgent, Realistic Task: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- Preserving peace and security on the Korean peninsula is a vital issue related to the destiny of the nation and a prerequisite to national reunification, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Korean peninsula is in the fragile state of armistice and both sides of the north and the south are standing in acute confrontation with the Military Demarcation Line in between.
					
					 If the peace and security fail to be achieved on the peninsula, the most dangerous hotspot in the world, instable situation will pose a threat to the existence and development of our nation and bring horrible disaster of a war to this inviolable territory of the country.
					
					 The north-south relations can never improve nor can the independent and peaceful reunification of the country be achieved, if the tension escalates and danger of a nuclear war increases on the peninsula.
					
					 Therefore, the Workers' Party of Korea put forward it as an important policy to ensure the peace and security on the peninsula and has made positive efforts to realize it. 
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean ruling forces, however, have seriously violated the peace and security on the peninsula with their reckless racket of provoking a war against the DPRK while going against the its efforts to preserve peace.
					
					 The U.S. should clearly understand the strategic position of the DPRK which ranked itself among the nuclear powers and the trend of the times, roll back its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK, replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace agreement and withdraw aggression forces and war equipment from south Korea.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop all reckless politically-motivated military provocations and war drills which oppose the fellow countrymen and endanger the peace and security on the peninsula by kowtowing to the U.S.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea will as ever preserve peace and security on the peninsula under the uplifted banner of Songun and dynamically accelerate the patriotic cause to achieve national reunification and prosperity.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Rebukes U.S. Accusations against DPRK's Satellites
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Rebukes U.S. Accusations against DPRK's Satellites
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- False stories about the DPRK's satellites are floating in the U.S. A national defence expert of the U.S. said there are two satellites of north Korea flying past the air over the U.S. mainland. He noted these satellites have likelihood of de-orbiting its course to directly strike the U.S. or emitting powerful electromagnetic wave capable of disrupting the state power grid when they blow up themselves in the air. The U.S. moves to cope with this are at a snail's pace, he added.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Thursday says that this is a brainchild unique to the U.S. which is steeped in inveterate repugnance and intention for standing in confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. that spearheaded the illegal "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK, labeling its launch of satellites for peaceful purposes as a "missile launch".
					
					 The U.S. stubborn insistence that the DPRK's satellites pose a "threat" is aimed to justify its frantic efforts to use outer space for military purposes and monopolize space and thus outstrip its potential rivals and hold supremacy over Asia-Pacific at any cost.
					
					 No matter how desperately the U.S. may try to bring down the DPRK while putting extreme political, economic and military pressure on the DPRK, this will only be taken as a noisy racket of a coward by the international community.
					
					 It is a foolish dream for the U.S. to seek to get something from cooperation for putting pressure on the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Newspaper Denounces Plan for Joint Military Drill
articles.content:
S. Korean Newspaper Denounces Plan for Joint Military Drill
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore on May 17 carried an editorial denouncing the south Korean army's plan for joint military drill.
					 Referring to the south Korea-U.S.-Japan joint drill for ballistic missile defense scheduled in Hawaii late in June, the editorial went on:
					
					 This is not a simple joint drill for missile defense but a step for tri-angular military bloc.
					
					 The joint military drill to be staged under the pretext of deterring "the north's provocation" may spill over to an international matter of diplomacy and security, not a military one.
					
					 The south Korean military authorities assert that this will be a rehearsal to be conducted in the field of information in the framework of a contract on sharing information but it is nothing but a trick, the editorial noted.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Commemorate May 18 Movement for Democracy
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Commemorate May 18 Movement for Democracy
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. held a ceremony for commemorating the movement for democracy in New York on May 14, 36 years since the May 18 Kwangju Popular Uprising, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo.
					 Present there were Koreans in New York, Washington, Boston, Virginia and other parts of the U.S.
					
					 Through the commemoration, memorial address, memorial poem and report on action, the participants remembered the spirit of the May 18 popular resistance and expressed their will to struggle to record a history of justice and turn south Korea into the society where human rights and lives are respected. 
					
					 Then a statement was read out.
					
					 It said that Koreans in the U.S. have honored so far the memory of the martyrs who were killed by the fascists during the May 18 Kwangju movement for democracy in 1980 and held a commemoration event every year with the desire for the peaceful reunification of the country and full democracy.
					
					 Koreans in various countries of the world are commemorating the May 18 movement for democracy in single mind, it noted.
					
					 The statement declared that they would denounce the brutal action against democracy and carry on the struggle to achieve the country's reunification and social democracy in solidarity with democratic forces of south Korea and overseas Koreans.

articles.title: DPRK Public Health Delegation Leaves for Switzerland
articles.content:
DPRK Public Health Delegation Leaves for Switzerland
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- A DPRK public health delegation headed by Minister of Public Health Kang Ha Guk left here Thursday to take part in the 69th meeting of the General Assembly of WHO to be held in Geneva.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Election as Chairman of WPK Celebrated by Nordic Progressive Political Parties, Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Election as Chairman of WPK Celebrated by Nordic Progressive Political Parties, Organizations
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- A joint meeting of the representatives of the Nordic progressive political parties and friendship organizations took place in Stockholm on May 14 to congratulate supreme leader Kim Jong Un on his election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The participants laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before an art piece depicting President Kim Il Sung standing together with leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Speeches were made by the chairman of the Communist Party in Sweden, Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, Juha Kieksy, chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea who doubles as international secretary of the Finnish Communists' League, Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, and other figures.
					
					 Speakers warmly congratulated Kim Jong Un on his election as chairman of the WPK according to the unanimous will and desire of all party members, service personnel and other people, expressing their pleasure over holding the meeting to celebrate the successful 7th Congress of the WPK.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 Also adopted there was a statement warmly congratulating Kim Jong Un on his election as chairman of the WPK.

articles.title: Successful End of 7th Congress of WPK Observed by Russian Paper
articles.content:
Successful End of 7th Congress of WPK Observed by Russian Paper
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- The Russian newspaper Zavtra No. 19 carried an article titled "Congratulations to the leader" and "Sacred flames of Juche" illustrated with a photo of the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il written by Editor-in-Chief Alexandr Prokhanov.
					 The newspaper referred to the successful conclusion of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) held in Pyongyang and said:
					
					 The Western "civilization" can not understand Juche.
					
					 The might of Juche was proved by the great and protracted history of the DPRK which defeated the monsters' attack and won a victory in a war with them and built its own style civilized nation.
					
					 The theory of Juche deals with the strength and ability of human being.
					
					 The newspaper referred to the position and role of the leader in the revolution and construction and went on:
					
					 Today the DPRK has the world-startling firmness and peculiar and original power.
					
					 A lot of countries and people of the world yielded to the U.S. this or that way and reduced into its colonies. 
					
					 But only the DPRK overcame the monsters' pressure.
					
					 The article extended warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un on his election as chairman of the WPK.

articles.title: U.S. Moves to Stifle DPRK Slammed by German Body
articles.content:
U.S. Moves to Stifle DPRK Slammed by German Body
Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany released a statement on May 9 in protest against the U.S. and its followers' moves to stifle the DPRK.
					 Noting the U.S. and south Korea and other followers' lack of ability to understand the reality began to be showed up with pathological symptoms, the statement said:
					
					 Far from recognizing the DPRK's full-fledged status as a nuclear weapons state to defend its sovereignty, peace and gains of socialism, they are behaving like a psychopath, desperately denying the status.
					
					 Serious is that the Western governments are apt to see the reality through blurred glasses due to decades-long anti-DPRK false propaganda.
					
					 The UN is behaving like a paper tiger, bereft of reason, after yielding to the unjust demand of the U.S. and its lackeys.
					
					 The UN should be reformed without delay and become the one speaking for justice where sound and reasonable countries are large in number.
					
					 It is just the U.S. and its followers which should be taken to an international court.
					
					 They deserve punishment for masterminding human rights abuses, war provocations and massacres in this era.
					
					 This is useful to Western countries including Germany troubled with the refugee crisis and is the only way of eradicating its root cause.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige sobre terreno Fabrica de Maquinas
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige sobre terreno Fabrica de Maquinas
Pyongyang, 19 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Fabrica de Maquinas donde trabaja Ho Chol Yong.
					El Mariscal, confiando con firmeza en los funcionarios y obreros de la fabrica, dio las tareas de producir nuevas y modernas maquinas y equipos de gran tamano durante la campana de 70 dias con motivo del VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					El Mariscal tomo personalmente las medidas para producir en serie las maquinas nuevas y modernas de nivel mundial y resolvio todos los problemas pendientes preguntandolos a menudo.
					
					Los funcionarios y obreros de la fabrica produjeron decenas de maquinas y equipos de alta capacidad con la tecnica y  materias primas domesticas y los enviaron a varias unidades de la economia nacional.
					
					El Mariscal dijo que hayan trabajado mucho por cumplir el enorme plan de produccion durante los 70 dias y agrego que los obreros de la fabrica prepararon un regalo magnifico dedicado al VII Congreso del PTC al materializar a toda costa el juramento hecho ante el partido.
					
					Todos los accesorios de cooperacion inclusive los medulares usados en la elaboracion de las maquinas y equipos son totalmente los nuestros producidos por nuestra fuerza, tecnica y materiales, apunto y agrego que el autofortalecimiento es la fuente de todos los milagros y no hay nada inconquistable al  poner de pleno manifiesto el espiritu de dar prioridad al autofortalecimiento.
					
					Recientemente, el partido se decidio a dar un salto mas alto la industria de construccion de maquinaria del pais y dirigio la modernizacion de numerosas fabricas de la rama segun la demanda de la epoca intelectual, dijo y prosiguio que esta fabrica ha llegado a producir cuanto quiera las maquinas y equipos dignos de enorgullecerse al mundo entero y ha entrado gallardamente en la fila de los vanguardistas de Mallima.
					
					El Mariscal recorrio el lugar de obra para la modernizacion del taller de acero fundido y la sala de divulgacion de ciencias y tecnicas.
					
					Lo importante en la modernizacion del taller de acero fundido es elevar al maximo la proporcion domestica del proceso de produccion y de tecnica, senalo y tomo la medida para este fin diciendo que el partido lo ayudaria activamente y la fabrica debe modernizarlo hasta el dia de la fundacion del partido.
					
					Hay que impulsar con ambicion y con vistas al futuro lejano la modernizacion de los procesos productivos en general junto con la obra de modernizacion del taller de acero fundido, apunto y presento las tareas asumidas ante la fabrica.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y obreros de la fabrica, siempre conscientes de la importancia de sus tareas asumidas en la lucha por la prosperidad del pais, crearan milagros y proezas en la produccion de maquinas y equipos modernos de alta capacidad de acuerdo con el proposito del partido y tomo una foto de recuerdo junto con ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron Ri Man Gon, vicepresidente del Comite Central del PTC y Jo Yong Won, subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Protocolo de XXIX reunion de comite conjunto RPDC-Rusia
articles.content:
Protocolo de XXIX reunion de comite conjunto RPDC-Rusia
Pyongyang, 19 de mayo (ACNC) -- Quedo rubricado el dia 19 el protocolo de la 29a reunion del comite conjunto Republica Popular Democratica de Corea-Rusia sobre la cooperacion en la rama de pesqueria.
					En la ceremonia de firmas, estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana los funcionarios del Ministerio de Industria Pesquera y otras ramas, y por la rusa, los miembros de la delegacion de la Agencia Federal de Pesqueria de la Federacion Rusa y el consejero de la embajada rusa en la RPDC.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia a EE.UU. que cuestiona satelites de RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia a EE.UU. que cuestiona satelites de RPDC
Pyongyang, 19 de mayo (ACNC) -- En Estados Unidos se difunden los rumores erroneos con respecto a los satelites artificiales de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. Un especialista de defensa nacional norteamericano dijo que los dos satelites del Norte de Corea (RPDC) estan volando en el espacio del territorio principal estadounidense y que estas dos lunas artificiales pueden golpear directamente a EE.UU. o emitir fuertes ondas electronicas capaces de impedir totalmente la red estatal de electricidad desviandose de su orbita. Y lamento diciendo que en su pais se toman lentamente las medidas para hacer frente a ello.
					En un comentario individual divulgado el dia 19, Rodong Sinmun condena que estos disparates devienen un ataque verbal que pueden inventar los fanaticos en la negacion a la RPDC y la confrontacion con ella.
					
					EE.UU. es el autor principal que fabrico la "resolucion de sancion" ilegal e injusta acusando el lanzamiento de satelite con fines pacificos como el "lanzamiento de misil".
					
					La insistencia de EE.UU. en que los satelites con fines pacificos de la RPDC constituyen "amenaza", parte de la intencion de legalizar sus freneticas maniobras destinadas a monopolizar la militarizacion cosmica para lograr a toda costa la hegemonia en la region de Asia-Pacifico manteniendo a raya a sus rivales potenciales.
					
					Por muy desesperadas que sean las maniobras de presion politica y economica y la amenaza militar de EE.UU. para doblegar la RPDC, la sociedad internacional lo considerara como tumultos de un debil ante un fuerte.
					
					El intento de ganar algo con la presion anti-RPDC es una vana ilusion nunca realizable.
